 <!--Head-->
<h1 align="center">Pigeon Fly</h1>

<h3>
Help the little pigeon in the vast space to find its main reward-a dream!

Meet a pigeon named Pidgy! And he's asking for your help.<br>
Help the little pigeon find his dream. And to do this, he needs to fly through the asteroid ring and not crash.<br>
Space is a treacherous place! And so Pidgie had stocked up on three pieces of bread for the long and dangerous journey in search of a dream.
It will be very difficult, but believe me, the reward is worth it!

Features of the game:<br>
⭐ ️ Unique visual design<br>
⭐ ️ Specially written music for an atmospheric game<br>
⭐ ️ Global Leaderboard<br>
⭐ ️ Get achievements in the process of passing and exploring space<br>

How to play?<br>
It's simple! Every time you touch the screen, you fly up and then automatically fall down.
So you need to maneuver between asteroids!

</h3>

</h3>
